cause.description:
Relay For Life® One day. One night. One community. Your Relay For Life® is about celebration, remembrance, and hope. By participating, you honor cancer survivors, pay tribute to the lives we've lost to the disease, and raise money to help fight it – all right here in your community. You won't want to miss one moment of this life- and community-affirming event!
1. Remember
2. Fight Back
3. Celebrate
cause.name: Relay For Life - Haddon Township
